message.content:
<<<api>>>: TypedArray.getString
<<<code>>>: 
public class SettingsActivity extends PreferenceActivity {

    @Override
    protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
        addPreferencesFromResource(R.xml.preferences);

        ListPreference listPreference = (ListPreference) findPreference("ex");
        listPreference.setOnPreferenceChangeListener(new Preference.OnPreferenceChangeListener() {
            @Override
            public boolean onPreferenceChange(Preference preference, Object newValue) {
                String value = (String) newValue;
                if (value.equals("male")) {
                    // Do something when male is selected
                } else if (value.equals("female")) {
                    // Do something when female is selected
                }
                return true;
            }
        });
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: In your preferences.xml file, you should replace your RadioGroup with a ListPreference. Then in your activity, you can set an OnPreferenceChangeListener on your ListPreference. When a new value is selected, the onPreferenceChange method will be called with the new value. You can then do something based on the new value.
